remarks: Lemma for ~ mapdpg .  (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mapdpglem.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
mapdpglem.m $e |- M = ( ( mapd ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdpglem.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdpglem.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
mapdpglem.s $e |- .- = ( -g ` U ) $.
mapdpglem.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
mapdpglem.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
mapdpglem.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
mapdpglem.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
mapdpglem.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
mapdpglem1.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` C ) $.
mapdpglem2.j $e |- J = ( LSpan ` C ) $.
mapdpglem3.f $e |- F = ( Base ` C ) $.
mapdpglem3.te $e |- ( ph -> t e. ( ( M ` ( N ` { X } ) ) .(+) ( M ` ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) ) $.
mapdpglem3.a $e |- A = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
mapdpglem3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mapdpglem3.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` C ) $.
mapdpglem3.r $e |- R = ( -g ` C ) $.
mapdpglem3.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
mapdpglem3.e $e |- ( ph -> ( M ` ( N ` { X } ) ) = ( J ` { G } ) ) $.
mapdpglem4.q $e |- Q = ( 0g ` U ) $.
mapdpglem.ne $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
mapdpglem4N $p |- ( ph -> ( X .- Y ) =/= Q ) $.
$d .- t $.
$d C t $.
$d J t $.
$d M t $.
$d N t $.
$d X t $.
$d Y t $.
